title: Which of the following is a valid way to pass the $callback parameter expected by array_walk()? (choose 3)

choices.b: An array containing the name of the function as the first element, and an array of arguments as the second element
choices.c: An instantiated object followed by the object operator and the method to call
choices.d: An array containing an instantiated object as the first element, and the method name as the second element
choices.e: A string containing the function name
choices.f: An array containing the function name as the first element
